content.title: Congratulations
content.body:
Congratulations
You have successfully:
  • Created a list form
  • Added widgets to the list form
  • Added data corresponding to the widgets
  • Viewed the application in your mobile device

To learn how to use templates in your segment, check out the hike:Introduction to Segment Templates .
To learn how to add data to your segment, check out the hike: Assign Data to Segments.
